_comment: Created by EFisher on 26/03/2014 17:08:00 using v2.1
title: How did patients feel about how good GPs and nurses were at giving them enough time?
analysis_commentary: During their appointment more than 80% of patients surveyed in 2012/13 said that the doctor or nurse were good at giving them enough time. This figure is not very different from the preceding three years. A larger percentage of patients consistently thought GPs were good at giving them enough time compared to nurses.
